nodes.text: The Wellspring was an online adventure story written by Morrie Mullins for Wizards of the Coast.
The game is open-ended and allows for the players to engage in the adventure at any time.

Their damaged starship has landed on the moon Lamus where the indigineous A'Mar have adopted a ritual known as The Vigil around the Wellspring. They agree to hold the ritual along with the child Olianna in exchange for repair parts.

During their guard they encounter a hunting party with the wounded individual Jeg; the party asks for them to break their guard and allow him to use the healing properties of The Wellspring. They are then attacked by a Beastlord.
